description.value: This pattern provides a means to convey textual information about a thing. For example, an advance directive, a medication statement, a section narrative. It is primarily intended for human interpretation. This includes unformatted or formatted written language.

definition.value: This pattern provides a means to convey textual information about a thing. For example, an advance directive, a medication statement, a section narrative. It is primarily intended for human interpretation. This includes unformatted or formatted written language.
